messages.subject: Sorry....
messages.msgSnippet: Jennifer, Thanks for thinking about those on digest. :-) Barb E It is change, continuing change, inevitable change, that is the dominant factor in society
messages.messageBody:
Jennifer,
Thanks for thinking about those on digest. :-)


Barb E
"It is change, continuing change, inevitable change, that
is the dominant factor in society today. No sensible
decision can be made any longer without taking into
account not only the world as it is, but the world as it
will be."

- Isaac Asimov, Science Fiction Writer




on 6/17/03 3:39 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Subject: Sorry was: manners
>
> Sorry to everyone on digest and those that don't like reading the same damn
> thing a million times. I somehow forgot to cut the post I was responding
> to. Guess this adds another post, but just so ya know!
>
> Jennifer
